subject: Baseball
Instant Replay (Sports)
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Major League Baseball announced that its teams had unanimously approved the expanded use of replay for 2014, and that the players’ and umpires’ unions had also agreed.
snippet: Major League Baseball announced that its teams had unanimously approved the expanded use of replay for 2014, and that the players’ and umpires’ unions had also agreed.
